text: Yudayahito ya kirisutokyōto wa iu. `Watashi-tachi wa arrā no kodeari, kare ni mede rareru.' Itte yaru ga ī. `Sorenara nazekare wa, anata gata no tsumi o bassa reru no ka. Iya, anata gata wa, kare ga tsukura reta ningen ni suginai. Kare wa, o nozomi no mono o yurushi, o nozomi no mono o bassa reru.' Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no subete no mono wa, arrā no taiken ni zokushi, mata kare koso wa kaeri-shona nodearu
